releases.name: v1.0.2
releases.description:
- Initial compatibility with 1.21<
- Added cooling system

> [!Note]
> This plugin is now basically compatible with versions after 1.21.
> However, there are still issues with some items not being able to replace properly (e.g., Unusual Banners).
> Please use with caution!!! (Versions below 1.21 are unaffected and can be used safely)

> If you encounter any problems, please submit Issues.

------

- 初步兼容1.21<
- 添加冷却系统

> [!Note]
> 本插件现已基本兼容1.21之后的版本
> 但还存在部分物品无法正常替换等问题(如: 不详旗帜)
> 请谨慎使用!!! (1.21 以下版本不受影响, 可放心使用)

> 遇到问题请提 Issues

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/shuangshun/Hat/commits/v1.0.2

description.en_us: Equip the item in your hand on your head
description.zh_cn: 将手中的物品戴到头上
